yanuwen mahela siya sathuta madhya wetha elesa prakasha kara thibuna.tharagaye dewani inimedi engalanthaya labadun lakunu 390 ka ilakkaya abhiyogayak lesa baragath shri lanka pithikaruwo panduwata paharadima aarambha kalath engalanthaye anduru kalagunika thaththwayath paswani dinaye thana thiruwe hasirimath matha tharagaya jaya paradumakin thorawa nimakara gannata shri lanka kridakayanta siduwuna.ehidi aarambhaka pithikaru dimuth karunarathnage ikman dawiyamath samanga pitiyata piwisunu sanga kaushal samanga ekwa diwa bhojanaya wana thek satankami lesa krida kala athara shathakayak kara yamata thibu awasthawa gana nowa rata gana sitha kadulla aaraksha karaganimin ardha shathakayak ras karagannata sanga samathwuna.mehidi pandu 168 kata muhuna dun sanga hathare pahara 4 k samanga lakunu 61 k labagath athara the panayen pasu andarsan kriyathmaka kala 3 wani oowaraye panduwak piththe athulatha daraye wadi gos wikattuwa bindi men dawi giya.sangakkara lods hidi 4 wani inime panduwata paharadimata pamini 3 wani awasthawa wu mema tharagayedi inim deke di shathakayak saha ardha shathakayak raskala dewani shri lanka kridakaya lesa ithihasayata ekwanawa.
